txt.en: When facing large numbers of enemies the role of the Hunter goes from that of deadly artist to a bringer of terror from the skies.
Strike enemies with Rain of Arrows

Quite the opposite of the Hunter's normally exacting art, the use of archery in mass battle is an indescriminate and impersonal affair. You loose volley after volley into the heavens, from where they fall among your enemies, seeking blood as they will.
